Articles.Content:
http://gimbalgame.com/

This is an space ship building and fighting game with newtonian physics.

It's pretty fun, it has the classic normal and team deathmatch and also has a race mode.

The game pretty much died recently but it needs a kick, the servers are way too empty.

It has Singleplayer, same as multiplayer but with bots.

Edited December 10, 2014 by gmpd2000
Also, i forgot to add, it is multiplayer.
Looks cool, we should start a ksp group

Yeah! On steam?

Also, i tried to get Scott Manley's attention about this game on youtube, no reply yet.
